Contact Our Vaccine Injury Lawyers

When you contact My Vaccine Lawyer, you will not be directed to a receptionist or client intake person – you will speak with one of our vaccine injury attorneys. We will closely examine the facts of your case, provide a comprehensive analysis and explain your legal options moving forward. We consider it a privilege to personally serve our clients and we look forward to working with you.

715 Twining Road, Suite 208
Dresher, PA 19025

(800) 229-7704

info@myvaccinelawyer.com

(215) 885-1644

IF YOU OR A LOVED ONE WERE INJURED BY A VACCINE, CONTACT US NOW.
DO NOT DELAY.

Contact us

My Vaccine Lawyer is the premier legal service that represents clients injured by vaccines across the United States. It's all we do and we do it well. We welcome the opportunity to represent you or your loved one for their potential vaccine injury claim. Call today to speak with one of our attorneys.
